attributes.action: provide acceptable living condition for personnel serving at RAF Brize Norton and other military establishments
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Housing at RAF Brize Norton is appalling. The majority of housing was built in reponse to the Cyprus Invasion over 30 years ago and has exceed it's shelf life. Since being posted here in 2006 we are in our 2nd property which is also riddled with mould and other problems. 
Apparently due to the subsided rental scheme it is acceptable for my family to live below the poverty line. 
New building work is meant to be happening however there are leaks that their is no money or planning permission in place.
These men and women put their life on the line on a daily basis yet their poor families are left to sit and rot. 
I'm sure these conditions are contrivening their basic human rights.
